verses.verse: 'Now <S%H518>if<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> is a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he is going to <S%H7126>offer<s%> out of the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H5347>female,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering<s%> and <S%H7819>slay<s%> it at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and Aaron's <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'And from the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>present<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>entrails<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on the <S%H7130>entrails,<s%>

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on them, <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H3689>loins,<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> which he shall <S%H5493>remove<s%> with the <S%H3629>kidneys.<s%>

'Then Aaron's <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> [it] up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is on the <S%H784>fire;<s%> it is an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> of a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is from the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it, <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5347>female,<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect.<s%>
<S%H518>'If<s%> he is going to <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H3775>lamb<s%> for his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

and he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> and <S%H7819>slay<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting;<s%> and Aaron's <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'And from the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> he shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> as an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> its <S%H2459>fat,<s%> the <S%H8549>entire<s%> <S%H451>fat<s%> <S%H451>tail<s%> which he shall <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H5980>close<s%> to the <S%H6096>backbone,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>entrails<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on the <S%H7130>entrails,<s%>

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on them, <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H3689>loins,<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> which he shall <S%H5493>remove<s%> with the <S%H3629>kidneys.<s%>

'Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> [it] up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> [as] <S%H3899>food,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
'Moreover, <S%H518>if<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> is a <S%H5795>goat,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

and he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on its <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H7819>slay<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'And from it he shall <S%H7126>present<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> as an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>entrails<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on the <S%H7130>entrails,<s%>

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on them, <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H3689>loins,<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> which he shall <S%H5493>remove<s%> with the <S%H3629>kidneys.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> them up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> [as] <S%H3899>food,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> for a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2459>fat<s%> is the Lord's.

'It is a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings:<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2459>fat<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>' "
